channel.title: About the Patching category
channel.description:
This category is for discussion about patching Axoloti, and sharing patches.
Have any questions about how to patch Axoloti, or the Axoloti objects function, or a patch to share, then please post here. If you have patch that does not work, and would like some help, considering posting it here to see if the community has some ideas.
If your looking for help on particular axoloti objects, or a particular patch that does not work, please try to reduce the patch to its simplest for that exhibits the problems or question you have, as patches can be pretty complex and 'seeing the woods for the trees' can be a real problem with complex patches.
